SELECT itemCode, date, price, stock, hotel.hotelCode, hotelmaster.name, hotelmaster.cityCode, city.Name as cityName, hotelmaster.grade, hotelmaster.basicPrice FROM Hotel inner join hotelmaster on hotel.hotelCode = hotelmaster.hotelCode inner join city on hotelmaster.cityCode = city.cityCode WHERE hotel.itemCode = #{ItemCode};

SELECT itemCode, date, price, stock, hotel.hotelCode, hotelmaster.name, hotelmaster.cityCode, city.Name as cityName, hotelmaster.grade, hotelmaster.basicPrice FROM Hotel inner join hotelmaster on hotel.hotelCode = hotelmaster.hotelCode inner join city on hotelmaster.cityCode = city.cityCode WHERE city.Name = #{inputCityName} and date >= #{inDate} and date < #{outDate} and price between #{lowPrice} and #{highPrice} and grade >= #{grade} ;

select hotel.itemCode as itemCode, hotelMaster.HotelCode as hotelCode, hotelMaster.Name as name, hotel.Date as date, City.Name as cityName, hotelMaster.Grade as grade, hotel.Price as price, hotel.Stock as stock from hotel inner join hotelMaster on hotel.HotelCode = hotelMaster.HotelCode inner join city on hotelmaster.CityCode = City.CityCode where (hotel.itemCode = #{itemCode} OR #{itemCode} = "") and (hotelmaster.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{hotelName}, '%') OR #{hotelName} = "") and (hotel.Date LIKE CONCAT('%', #{date}, '%') OR #{date} = "") ;

SELECT hotel.ItemCode AS itemCode, hotel.HotelCode AS hotelCode, hotelmaster.Name AS name, hotel.Date AS date, city.Name AS cityName, hotelmaster.Grade AS grade, hotel.Price AS price, hotel.Stock AS stock FROM hotel INNER JOIN hotelmaster ON hotel.HotelCode = hotelmaster.HotelCode INNER JOIN city ON hotelmaster.CityCode = city.CityCode WHERE hotel.ItemCode = #{ItemCode} ;

SELECT hotel.itemCode as itemCode, hotelMaster.HotelCode as hotelCode, hotelMaster.Name as name, hotel.Date as date, hotel.Price as price, hotel.Stock as stock FROM hotel inner join hotelMaster on hotel.HotelCode = hotelMaster.HotelCode WHERE (hotelmaster.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{hotelName}, '%') OR #{hotelName} = "*") and ( (hotel.date BETWEEN #{startdate} AND #{enddate}) or (#{startdate} = "" AND #{enddate} = "") ) ORDER BY name,date ;
